name: assitive technology used by blind people
desc: The Advanced Edge AI Navigation System aids blind users by providing real-time object detection and navigation support using computer vision and edge AI..

name: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
desc: Designed an AI-powered RAG system that processes documents, websites, and Excel sheets to provide accurate answers to queries.

name: heartdisease
desc: heart disease detection uses medical imaging analysis to identify and diagnose cardiovascular conditions with high accuracy.

name: AI Agents for Specialized Domains
desc: Developed AI agents for various specialized domains. The AI Coding Agent provides precise coding solutions for programming-related queries.

name: spam mail detection
desc: Spam mail detection using NLP analyzes the text content of emails to identify patterns, keywords, and language cues that classify them as spam or legitimate

name: Roadsign for autonomous vehicles
desc: Road sign recognition for autonomous vehicles uses computer vision and machine learning to detect and interpret traffic signs, enabling safe and automated navigation.

name: Wildlife Detection
desc: Wildlife Detection is a real-time system that utilizes YOLOv8 for detecting and classifying wildlife in video streams, drawing bounding boxes around identified animals with confidence scores.
